ygData.subject: More mistmoore questions
ygData.msgSnippet: First off ,thanks J.K. for the advice- a couple more questions tho- I know the black silk gloves are no drop, but are the gypsy lutes as well? Also, how does
ygData.messageBody:
First off ,thanks J.K. for the advice- a couple more questions tho- I know
the black silk gloves are no drop, but are the gypsy lutes as well?
Also, how does regular invis work against the mobs-at least the ones outside
the castle?
I have been having pretty good luck in acquiring many of the bard items due
to the generosity and help from others I've come in contact with-it always
pays to be nice to people:)-hoping my luck can hold out in MM and SolA-(my
next stop for the vambraces and boots). I just HATE dying :)-

Thanks again
Scanna
